SEARCH

Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
Appointment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Appointment extends Object implements Serializable
This class manages medical appointments between doctors and patients in the system Implements Serializable for persistent storage
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Appointment

      public Appointment(String doctorId, String doctorName, LocalDate appointmentDate, LocalTime appointmentTime)
      Constructs a new Appointment with the specified doctor information and time slot. Generates a unique UUID for the appointment and sets initial status to OPEN.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The unique identifier of the doctor
      doctorName - The name of the doctor
      appointmentDate - The date of the appointment
      appointmentTime - The time of the appointment

  • Method Details

    • deserialize

      protected static ArrayList<Appointment> deserialize()
      Deserializes appointments from a file.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Appointment objects, or null if deserialization fails

    • serialize

      protected static boolean serialize(ArrayList<Appointment> allAppointments)
      Serializes appointments to a file.
      Parameters:
      allAppointments - List of appointments to serialize
      Returns:
      true if serialization is successful, false otherwise

    • getAppointmentId

      public String getAppointmentId()
      Gets the unique identifier of this appointment.
      Returns:
      The appointment's UUID as a String

    • getPatientId

      public String getPatientId()
      Gets the ID of the patient scheduled for this appointment. Will be empty string if the appointment slot is not taken.
      Returns:
      The patient's ID, or empty string if no patient is scheduled

    • getDoctorId

      public String getDoctorId()
      Gets the ID of the doctor assigned to this appointment.
      Returns:
      The doctor's ID

    • getAppointmentDate

      public LocalDate getAppointmentDate()
      Gets the scheduled date of the appointment.
      Returns:
      The appointment date as a LocalDate object

    • getAppointmentTime

      public LocalTime getAppointmentTime()
      Gets the scheduled time of the appointment.
      Returns:
      The appointment time as a LocalTime object

    • getAppointmentStatus

      public Appointment.AppointmentStatus getAppointmentStatus()
      Gets the current status of the appointment. Status can be SCHEDULED, PENDING, COMPLETED, CANCELLED, or OPEN.
      Returns:
      The current AppointmentStatus enum value of the appointment

    • schedulePatient

      public boolean schedulePatient(String patientId)
      Schedules a patient for this appointment.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient to schedule
      Returns:
      true if scheduling is successful

    • resetSlot

      public boolean resetSlot()
      Resets the appointment slot to open status.
      Returns:
      true if reset is successful

    • approveSlot

      public boolean approveSlot()
      Approves a pending appointment, sets its status to SCHEDULED.
      Returns:
      true if approval is successful

    • declineSlot

      public boolean declineSlot()
      Declines a pending appointment, sets its status to OPEN.
      Returns:
      true if decline is successful

    • cancelSlot

      public boolean cancelSlot()
      Marks the appointment as cancelled.
      Returns:
      true if cancellation is successful

    • completeSlot

      public boolean completeSlot()
      Marks the appointment as completed.
      Returns:
      true if completion is successful

    • createSlot

      public static Appointment createSlot(Doctor doctor, LocalDate appointmentDate, LocalTime appointmentTime)
      Creates a new appointment slot for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor for whom to create the appointment
      appointmentDate - The date of the appointment
      appointmentTime - The time of the appointment
      Returns:
      A new Appointment instance

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints all details of the appointment to the console. Includes doctor's name, doctor's ID, patient's ID, appointment date, appointment time, and appointment status.
